name: get_image
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sendapic_api.
Tool description: https://sendapic.xyz/

🔐 Send confidential images securely and safely with an expiring link.
💣 Choose the duration of the expiry, and feel safe knowing it will be deleted after expiry.
API description: Retrieve an image by its file ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

fileid.description: The ID of the image file to retrieve.
